text:
@tonyschwartz This is only a huge scandal if people talk about it: Jared Kushner’s shadow coronavirus task force appears to be violating multiple laws by using private email accounts with no assurance their communications are being preserved and by meeting in secret.

https://t.co/V7hy09S9K4
